description.@en: Before a person is made a Hexer, they must go through three rigorous trials, culminating in the consumption of intense alchemical decoctions to mutate their physiological selves.

effect.@en:
Whenever you attempt to Resist Disease
  or Poisons (including Intoxication), you may flip the results to succeed at Toughness Tests. When you succeed, it is always considered a Critical Success. You also understand how to use the Ritual of Trace Sigil. Substitute Folklore in place of Incantation when using the Ritual of Trace Sigil, but you cannot Channel Power.
